content:
Repository Achievements

ElderHS-QoL-Extension-InDev-Versions

  • Developed an in-development extension for ElderHS, enhancing Quality of Life (QoL) features.
  • Managed and provided access to in-development versions of the extension.
  • Utilized GitHub for version control and distribution of development builds.

MCLib.js-and-MCDPCreator

  • Developed a JavaScript library (MCLib.js) for creating Minecraft command libraries and a Minecraft Datapack Creator.
  • Implemented core functionalities such as element manipulation (kill, on, hide, attr) to create Minecraft Datapacks more efficiently.
  • Utilized JavaScript libraries like JSzip, jQuery, Google's Blockly.js, Bootstrap to create a more streamlined and organized Minecraft Datapack creation process.

catGUI

  • Developed a GUI library (catGUI) for Love2d, streamlining the process of testing and running game-related code within Love2d.
  • Designed the library to benefit from a UI.
  • Implemented MIT License for open source use.

YABFBC

  • Created a Flappy Bird clone using Lua.

txtToBin

  • Developed a Lua program to convert text to binary, demonstrating understanding of character encoding and file handling in a limited character set.
  • Solved text-to-binary conversion assignment.

YABFBC_3.0

  • Created a Flappy Bird clone in Lua for the Love2D framework.
  • Implemented complex game features and logic, such as player movement, collision detection, parallax scrolling, and state management.
  • Utilized Anim8 library for sprite animation and JSON for data management.

Pecks-and-Balances

  • Developed a Lua Game, Pecks-and-Balances, an entry for a game design competition.
  • The game focused on climate change awareness
  • Demonstrates the development of core game mechanics, including interactive prompts and stat management.

catLib

  • Developed a modular game library for the Love2D game engine.
  • Implemented functions for rendering, object management with scale functions.
  • Supports animation via Anim8, and parallax functionality.

mmlgkp

  • Created a JavaScript script (bookmarklet and standalone script) to automate the download of mp3 files from KHinsider.
  • Automated the download of a large batch with a javascript script.
  • Utilized JavaScript to parse HTML, and perform HTTP requests to fetch the mp3 links.

Amiitool-Encrypt-all

  • Developed a batch script for encrypting Amiibo bin files using Amiitool.
  • Automated the process of encrypting files in a structured directory layout.

CraftBox

  • Developed a minecraft server manager written in Python.
  • Created a server manager to improve game experience.
  • Managed server instances and configurations.

52Pickup

  • Developed a simple card game in JavaScript along with an html and css front end
  • Created a game loop, with a clickable cards
  • Stored and displayed high scores using local storage.

sparkle-on

  • Demonstrates use of Flask 3 on Vercel with Serverless Functions using the Python Runtime

LoveKhinsiderDL

  • Demonstrates a Download program written in Lua for Love2D, to help simplify downloading and exploring of Khinsider assets.

KHdownloaderPlus

  • Created a Python script with Flask to download files from the KHinsider.
  • Managed async downloads and HTTP requests for file retrieval
  • Implemented error handling and filename sanitization.

L2Dwindow

  • Developed a Program for rendering a LUA program.
  • Demonstrated use of love2d to create and render elements for a Lua application.

Technical Skills

Lua JavaScript HTML CSS Python Batchfile Love2D Flask Game Development Web Scraping Automated Tool Development File Handling Version Control (Git, GitHub) JSON Asynchronous Programming Server Management
